reuters.title: DOMTAR SETS TWO-FOR-ONE STOCK SPLIT TO TAKE EFFECT MAY 14
reuters.body: The Federal Reserve entered the U.S. Government securities market to arrange 1.5 billion dlrs of customer repurchase agreements, a Fed spokesman said. Dealers said Federal funds were trading at six pct when the Fed began its temporary and indirect supply of reserves to the banking system. Reuter 
